FileFormat.FormatDescription: Progressive Graphics File (PGF) is a raster image format developed by Christoph Stamm. Please contact the PRONOM team if you are able to provide a more detailed description.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: "PGF", Version = The source code suggests possible versions 2, 5, 6, 7, however samples available from the libpgf SourceForge project site are all version 6. http://libpgf.org/fileadmin/MEDIA/PGF_Details.pdf
